data.title: Find a CRA address
data.meta_description: This Web page provides contact information including CRA mailing addresses for provincial and territorial Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) tax services offices and tax centres.
data.text:
Drop boxes are reopening this tax season

The CRA will be reopening drop boxes across Canada this tax season. The reopening will be phased in as drop boxes become ready for use. Check the list of CRA office addresses and drop box status to see which drop boxes are open near you.

To protect your sensitive information and make sure your items gets to the CRA quickly and securely, we encourage you to:
